awards.Special: Bonus: If you take the Diary of Herbi Flax to the Apothecary in Varrock, you'll get an extra 335 Herblore experience (can only be done once).
Ability to claim 5 Kudos and an antique lamp for 1,000 experience (in any skill over level 20) by talking to Historian Minas in the Varrock Museum.
